Title: Relates to penalties for failure of an operator to return shared electric scooters and bicycles to a proper location
Summary: Requires entities which operate a system of shared electric bicycles or scooters to impose penalties for failure of an operator or borrower to return a shared electric scooter or bicycle to a proper location.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to penalties for failure of an operator to return shared electric scooters and bicycles to a proper location
